message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's something I've been working on for a long time and I'm confident it has the potential to be a real game-changer for your business. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This is a significant discount from what I would normally charge, and it reflects the high value I place on establishing a mutually beneficial relationship. I know this product is worth a lot to you, and I'm confident you'll see the incredible return on investment it offers. Let me know your thoughts.
